quote: Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility, and most people are frightened of responsibility. – Sigmund Freud
fact: The scene where Indiana Jones shoots the swordsman in Raider’s of the Lost Ark was Harrison Ford's idea so that he could take a bathroom break.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I saw a documentary on TV last night about how they put ships together.  It was rivetting.
